abstract: The most annoying phrases of 2012, small-business predictions for 2013, start-ups to watch — and you won’t believe how many people applied to work at Comcast last year.

lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners this week.

headline.main: This Week In Small Business: YOLO!
